record.field: Work Quality: accuracy and detailed oriented in work while following standards and procedures.
Creativity and Innovative: ability to think in non-conventional way. Creativity in finding solutions and in exploring new options/ideas.

Job Knowledge and technical expertise: having proper relevant technical know-how and expertise. Commitment to continue learning and application. High ability of technical writing, reporting and data collection.
Productivity and Result Orientation: Identify key indicators and expected results. Focus on achieving objectives and overcoming difficulties.
Critical and Analytical Thinking: ability to spot problems and use analysis for better understanding of causes and effects. Map out issues in a logical and consistent manner.
Communication: Organizes and expresses ideas and information clearly, using appropriate and efficient methods of conveying the information whether it is verbal or written.
Communication: Organizes and expresses ideas and information clearly, using appropriate and efficient methods of conveying the information whether it is verbal or written.
Customer Orientation: ability to identify who are the customers and understand customer requirements and satisfaction needs.
Initiative: Works independently to solve problems. Looks for opportunities to take on more responsibility.
Flexibility: ability to work through uncertainty. Flexibility to change direction and adopt new approaches. Motivated with changes and challenges. Open and willing to learn.
Team Work: Works on projects as part of a team, exchanging ideas and contributing skills that complement those of the other team members. Fulfills commitments to team members.
Decision Making: ability to choose/decide on one option/solution and justification of the course of action decided upon.
Strategic Planning and Time Management: set clear objectives and priorities. Ability to develop plan and allocate resources as well as manage time.
Managing People: willingness to lead the way for others .Coach, evaluate and develop others. Ability to delegate, empower and support staff.
Safety Awareness: focusing on what have done to help prevent wrong incidents in the workplace. It also helps to understand the importance of safety.
Follow-up Action: Track individual goals and workflow with concerned departments and customers.
Attendance and Punctuality: Occurrence, emergency leaves, sick leave, arriving and leave on time.
Attitude: has a very positive and friendly manner which makes working with him a very pleasant experience and enjoying his consistent professionalism and positive attitude.
Appearance and Work Attire: Proper grooming and a professional appearance are important to gain respect in the workplace. Have to stick to dress code policy.
Companies Policies and Rules: following all the rules and policies which issued through the authorized departments.
Dependability: the quality that lets people know that you will do what you said and will do it to the best of your ability.
